title: Pain
prompts: Do you like to give pain, receive pain, or both?
Is pain more of a sensory experience or an erotic experience for you?

title: Restraint
prompts: Do you like to be restrained, restrain others, or both?
Is the goal for you restriction of movement, vulnerability, helplessness, enforcing obedience, or something else?

title: Physical altercation
prompts: Do you want this to play out as one partner submitting to the other, or as a fight for dominance?

title: Caregiving
description: Praise, goals, rewards, age regression, etc.
prompts: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Caregiver, little, owner, pet, daddy, or something else?
What is your goal? Encouraging self-care, healing trauma, feeling emotional security, or something else?

title: Ownership
prompts: Do you want to have ownership over someone, or be owned yourself?
How do you want control or possession to be expressed or enforced?

title: Degradation or humiliation
prompts: Do you want to be degraded or humiliated, or degrade/humiliate someone else?
Do you want the degradation or humiliation to target appearance, worth, ability, vulnerability, exposure, or something else?

title: Rules or protocol
description: Titles, orders, petplay, obedience training, etiquette, etc.
prompts: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Dominant, submissive, pet, handler, authority figure, etc.

title: Vulnerability
prompts: Do you want to feel vulnerable, or make someone else feel vulnerable?
What makes you feel most vulnerable? How do you enjoy making others feel vulnerable?

title: Fear
prompts: What role do you want to play in this dynamic? Dominant, submissive, interrogator, victim, hunter, prey, etc.
Do you want the fear to be more psychological and existential, or more intimidating and imminently threatening?

title: Novel sensations
prompts: What kinds of sensations do you want to experience or provide?

title: Aesthetics
prompts: Do you want to be the object or the observer of the aesthetic experience?
What kind of aesthetic do you want to create?
Do you want the decision-making to be collaborative or one-sided?
